name: McCormick Coal Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Schubert

judges: Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Aenold, JJ.
parties: McCormick Coal Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Schubert.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Graff, specially presiding.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. C. Brandon, with him Brandon, Millar, Rockenstein & MacFarlane, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
McCormick Coal Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Schubert.
Argued October 1, 1954.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Aenold, JJ.
November 8, 1954:
Carmen V. Marinaro, for appellant.
J. C. Brandon, with him Brandon, Millar, Rockenstein & MacFarlane, for appellee.
